archimate:Deliverable.name: Design blueprint for deployment in in-country ServiceNow instances
archimate:Deliverable.documentation:
Design blueprint ensures project is taking into account the need of country specific needs. As a result of Global ServiceNow deployment, a blueprint is created which is guiding how the system is enabled in our in-country instances.
All designs will adhere/address following:
- Required People and the processes - Security policies and best practises - Information and data in the system - Dependencies to other services - Connect Sovereign in-country operations requirements - Standard IT Service Management - Capacity management - Availability, resilience and disaster recovery - Risk management - End user & operator trainings
